title: Mobile Device Automation with AskUI
excerpt: Learn how to automate iOS and Android devices using AskUI Suite's advanced capabilities.
content:
Mobile device automation presents unique challenges. AskUI Suite makes it easy.

## iOS Automation

Our iOS automation capabilities provide comprehensive coverage for your testing needs.

## Android Automation

Android automation is equally powerful, with support for all major versions.

## Best Practices

1. Use device-specific optimizations
2. Handle different screen sizes
3. Account for platform differences
4. Implement proper error handling

## Real-World Examples

See how our customers are using mobile automation to improve their testing processes.
author: Lisa Park
